FOOTER.DESCRIPTION: Because every moment deserves a flower, we provide you with the most beautiful flower arrangements, designed with love to suit all your occasions. Order now and enjoy fast delivery and an unforgettable experience.

WARDA_DETAILS.TITLE: Warda: A Touch of Beauty for Every Occasion
WARDA_DETAILS.SUBTITLE: Discover a world of elegance and beauty with Warda
WARDA_DETAILS.DESCRIPTION: You can design your own bouquet from the finest and freshest flowers. Select each flower carefully, or choose from our special collection ready to be gifted for every occasion.
WARDA_DETAILS.ALL_FLOWERS: All types of flowers for your occasions
WARDA_DETAILS.STORES: A large number of diverse stores
WARDA_DETAILS.CUSTOMIZATION_DESC: Design your bouquet your own way
WARDA_DETAILS.SATISFACTION_DESC: An exceptional experience that meets your expectations
WARDA_DETAILS.QUALITY_DESC: Fresh flowers carefully selected to last long

WARD_DETAILS.TITLE: At Warda
WARD_DETAILS.DESCRIPTION: At Warda, we believe that every flower carries a message, and every bouquet tells a story. We are a specialized platform for offering the most beautiful floral arrangements with the highest quality and best prices, with the ability to design your own bouquet, flower by flower, according to your unique taste.

CUSTOM_BOUQUET.TITLE: Custom Bouquet Design
CUSTOM_BOUQUET.DESCRIPTION: Freedom to choose every flower in the bouquet to match your taste and unique style.

FRESH_FLOWERS.TITLE: Fresh & High-Quality Flowers
FRESH_FLOWERS.DESCRIPTION: We ensure carefully selected flowers that last longer.

DIVERSE_STORES.TITLE: Diverse Stores
DIVERSE_STORES.DESCRIPTION: A large number of sellers provide you with various options at different prices.

BEST_MOMENTS.TITLE: Make Your Moments Bloom with Beauty!
BEST_MOMENTS.DESCRIPTION: Explore our wide collection of carefully designed flowers for every occasion, and order your perfect bouquet with ease. We guarantee quality, fast delivery, and the best experience!

BLOGS.TITLE: Our Blog - Petals of Inspiration
BLOGS.COLOR_SYMBOLS: What Are the Color Symbols in the World of Flowers?
BLOGS.COLOR_MEANING: Learn about the meanings of each flower color and how to choose the right one for every occasion.

FAQS.TITLE: Everything You Need to Know About Warda
FAQS.DESCRIPTION: We have all the answers you need! If you have any questions about our services, ordering process, or flower delivery, you will find all the information here.
FAQS.QUESTION_1: How can I place an order through Warda?
FAQS.ANSWER_1: Simply select the bouquet you like, add it to the cart, then proceed with payment, specifying the delivery address and your preferred delivery time.
FAQS.QUESTION_2: Can I customize a flower bouquet according to my preference?
FAQS.ANSWER_2: Yes, you can choose every flower in your bouquet to match your unique taste and style.
FAQS.ANSWER_3: Delivery time varies, but we always strive to provide fast and reliable service. You can check estimated delivery times at checkout.
